name: CKAccountStatus
desc: Constants that indicate the availability of the user’s iCloud account.

items.name: case available
items.desc: The user’s iCloud account is available.

items.name: case couldNotDetermine
items.desc: CloudKit can’t determine the status of the user’s iCloud account.

items.name: case noAccount
items.desc: The device doesn’t have an iCloud account.

items.name: case restricted
items.desc: The system denies access to the user’s iCloud account.

items.name: case temporarilyUnavailable
items.desc: The user’s iCloud account is temporarily unavailable.
